title: Pork of the Sea
summaries: The Pork of the Sea is a pet-summoning item dropped by Duke Fishron in Master Mode, with a 25*1/4 (25%) chance to drop. When used or equipped, it summons a smaller version of Duke Fishron that acts as a pet.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a tiny Fishron
'Brined to perfection.'
statistics.Sell: 5
